titleStmt.title: The sermon of Ioh[a]n the bysshop of Rochester made agayn the p[er]nicious doctryn of Martin luther w[i]t[h]in the octaues of the asce[n]syon by the assigneme[n]t of the most reuerend fader i[n] god the lord Thomas Cardinal of Yorke [and] legate ex latere from our holy father the pope.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
D7,8 in pen facsimile of STC 10895.
